payload.llm_output:
- Ensure that the extracted features are relevant and specific to the product. Avoid generic features that could apply to any product.
- Make sure to accurately identify the source of each feature. This could be from the product's title, part number, or manufacturer.
- Try to extract as many features as possible, within the specified range of 5 to 15. This will provide a more comprehensive overview of the product.
- Be consistent in the formatting and presentation of the features. This includes using standardized abbreviations and units, and presenting the features in a structured and organized manner.
- Avoid including any subjective or promotional information about the product. Stick to factual, measurable, and specification-grade attributes.
